website_summaries.verdict: Pamper yourself with this deluxe, highly moisturizing mask containing 24K gold.
pros: Gives noticeable results in a short period of time
Very hydrating, unlike other gold masks
Leaves aging skin feeling soft and smooth
cons: Smell is unpleasant to downright awful for a minority of users

customer_reviews.title: Big Difference
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a glow facial for a while now, but I didn't want to pay those expensive spa prices. I'm so grateful to have ran across this amazing product. I can definitely see the difference after just one treatment! I'm so excited about my results. I will be ordering more...
customer_reviews.author: Taquila Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Want to look 10 or more years younger?
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best I’ve ever used. I’m in my mid 60’s and people can’t believe I’m much over 50. I use this 2-3 times a week and my facial skin is very soft, wrinkles less and hardly pronounced. I highly recommend this product for anyone. My face is very dry in some areas and not as dry in others and this works great for any skin. I use on neck and chest area too!
customer_reviews.author: Serendipity

customer_reviews.title: Pamper Yourself
customer_reviews.text: This pure gold facial mask gives you the feeling of having a Spa treatment. It is easy to use and provides noticeable results in a short period of time. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geissinger

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask is easy to apply and wash off, and leaves your skin hydrated and glowing. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: xheathermerx

customer_reviews.title: Sparkly and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: While actual gold in the mask is minimal, it’s a nice mask that leaves your skin feeling moisturized long after you use it. The smell is a little strange, but not too bad. Will probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. It was very easy to use and I had smoother, clearer skin after just one application!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the mask felt. My skin felt more moisturized and clean.
customer_reviews.author: stephen fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Feel like GOLD!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these - they were a huge hit!! Will be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: WoodElf3

customer_reviews.title: I don't have acne prone or sensitive skin, but this made my face break out BADLY.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews and was so excited to put this miraculous product on my face! It felt great on, everything went fine, and the next morning I woke up with about 5 pimples on my face and some dermatitis spots. The acne is not at all normal for me. I do have dermatitis that flares every so often, so this clearly wasn't something I'll use again as my skin did not approve of it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mask, Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mask, live skin soft and silky. As well it's very easy to play and remove. Gives wonderful relaxing and fun time as well. Its 20-25 minus on skin, I used that time for fun videos. Mask is very light and just live slight glow as you apply it but almost invisible. Arived fast, had factory plastic wrap. Beautiful container, looking really luxurious on the counter as well. No irritation during or after the use.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Agee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and felt great!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time last night so can't give too much info, but it was easy to apply, not at all offensive to my skin or nose, and my skin felt soft and supple once I took it off. I will be using more often and will update my review as well once I see how long term use works with my skin. so far, I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: Soothing, moisturizing mask!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the mask. It was soothing to my skin and left my face with a youthful glow.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: pluses and minus
customer_reviews.text: This mask makes my skin so soft and smooth, however if I leave it on for 25 minutes I begin to taste metal in my mouth, that is concerning.........
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I thought it’d be fun to try this mask together. The first thing we noticed was that the smell was very unpleasant. Then, it caused her face to itch so badly that she had to wash it off. I didn’t have the itching, but after washing it off of my face my skin began to burn and then peeled for several days. It also made my facy oily. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is SO great!! Luxurious and moisturizing. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice moisturizing & glowing face
customer_reviews.text: It gives a nice glow with just one use. Leaves skin soft & supple. It’s a good product worth a try. Applicator included could feel a bit small for your hands. Liked the container of the facial mask. Different jar looks stylish & could be reused.
customer_reviews.author: Priyesha Jain

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for over four months with no change to my skin. The mask is extremely sticky and hard to wash off the face.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity

customer_reviews.title: This mask made my face feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Once I removed the mask, my skin felt a little waxy and I was skeptical, but within a minute or two, it left my skin feeling more moisturized than it's ever been in my life! There was no unpleasant itching or tingling while wearing the mask, and it was easy to rinse off. Definitely my new favorite mask!
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a nice plastic jar!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product! You have to let it sit for 20 minutes which is kind of hard.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Leake

customer_reviews.title: Buy Majestic Pure always
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome. Makes your face feel so moisturized. I love all the Majestic Pure products. They are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Freck  i love redTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: "It's a go"
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit premature because I have only used it one time. I was really impressed with how easily it applied. You don't waste product because it glides on effortlessly. My face really felt good when I removed it. It was soft but I felt something continuing to work. Like blood was being circulated underneath. I will update after a couple months. I so far love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rejuvenating Mask
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of masks. This one was easy to apply, felt great on my skin, and easy to remove. After applying, my skin felt so smooth and appeared rejuvenated. No breakouts or disruptions to the skin, which I normally expect with special treatments. This was a perfect treat and is now part of my skincare routine. I rotate this with some of the other Majestic Pure masks.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: I got this because it is cold out and my face was so dry I used this to add moisture back into my skin. I don’t like using lotions because there always seems to make my face break out. It helped a lot I don’t need lotion or oil and my face is not overly dry now.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: LEAVE THE SKIN DRY AFTER REMOVE THE MASK.
customer_reviews.text: I used as soon i got it i follow all the instruction, i applied a fair amount to my face and massage for a good 1-2 minutes and wait 20 minutes ,I wash my face with water to remove all the product and feel dry like a rough sensation, doesn't give you smooth results. Disappointed because I expect better result since is a face mask, normal you expect to have a clean and shine look after used and my face look opaque.
customer_reviews.author: Kadez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I've got very sensitive skin and this did not bother me at all and the fragrance is not overwhelming, nothing like having something with a horrendous smell all over your face. This left my face soft, and I did not notice any shimmery gold specs left on my face which I had been concerned about.
customer_reviews.author: K. Doss

customer_reviews.title: Gold star!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is very moisturizing and easy to apply. The presentation is very classy and is not an eye sore in the bathroom. I work very long hours and this face mask just hydrates my my face so much after a long day at the office. It has a nice clean scent that isn’t overwhelming. Definitely will buy again...but it may take some time to even run out...(there is a lot of product in this container).
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Nice masks
customer_reviews.text: The packaging alone is worth it. Love Majestic Pure Masks. Very gentle on the skin but works really good. Update: this is a nice mask but I think this mask is good to be used in the winter and by people who have dry skin. This will be perfect for me when the winter comes. Right now, I stick with using the Majestic Pure Dead Sea Mud Mask. My skin tends to be oilier in the summer and drier in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Helen E. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FACE MASK
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product !!! Its a must buy ! I saw immediate results and my skin feels rejuvenated !
customer_reviews.author: jean marie motz

customer_reviews.title: Soft face
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry sensitive skin this is the mask for you. I love this mask. I use it almost every night and my skin loves it. I steam my face then apply this and leave it on for 30min to 1 hr. My face has never felt so soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love this face mask!
customer_reviews.text: This a great fave mask. It’s simple and doesn’t look like it would pack such a powerful punch. I used this and felt my face become softer and smoother, even without a cunning beads unit. It’s not heavy and it doesn’t keep slipping off. I like that I’m not stuck in one place while wearing it. I ca cook, clean or relax, it’s up to me!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bressem-chang

customer_reviews.title: Face mask.
customer_reviews.text: Feels nice on my face. I like it. Makes my skin feel good. Easy to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mask it makes your skin feel so soft and moisturized. Also helps with fine lines!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Isreal

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it since May and it doesn't do anything! I am very unhappy with this product and would like a complete refund! Don't waste your time buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: ACB

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The scent is ughhh but I felt luxurious because of its color. It's moisturizing but my skin is super dry so I still feel dryness on some areas of my face. I am hoping that it tightens my skin with time and prevents early age wrinkling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ad

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!!!!! Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Came in small jar , opened very easily , the consistency was not very thick . I used it 2 time already and I like it , after putting this golden mask my face got smooth , and it really improved your skin tone .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face
customer_reviews.text: The 1st time I used it it burned my cheeks. I let my mother in law and sister try and it burned them too. By no means do I have sensitive skin. No other 24k mask I've ever used has ever done that to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other facial masks, this was not my favorite. It leaves my skin oily and I feel the need to wash my face with a face wash after. I like the packaging and quantity of the product for this price but I prefer other face masks over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ayra Syed

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this face mask
customer_reviews.text: I always use face mask almost every night before I sleep and I also have my own full skincare routine. I decided to try and get one of Majestic Pure's gold mask and it's the best ancient gold mask that I've ever tried so far. I love how the mask replenishes my skin. Whenever I use the product I always feel fresh and clean and I'm not afraid to use cosmetics or makeup on my skin. I love this product so much and everyone should try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Edison

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced mask but noted no difference
customer_reviews.text: I have a cabinet full of masks & other potions. I always am interested in trying new ones. I've used the gold mask a couple of times a week for a few weeks now. It smells nice & feels nice but I see nothing of significance in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: hecklerpix

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely not what it claims to be. It claims to be a face mask however it is more like kids slime. The worst part about it is that I cannot even return this product. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: MrzHernandez82

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This mask is absolute perfect for my skin after use you can see glow on your face and leaves your skin soft
customer_reviews.author: Talha

customer_reviews.title: It's a little cumbersome to cleanse
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. It is a product that saves money at a professional store. It's a little cumbersome to cleanse
customer_reviews.author: jung hwan seo

customer_reviews.title: It kinda leaves your face feeling itchy...
customer_reviews.text: It's not horrible...just not what it seemed it would be either. It's cute, but kinda just a cheapie, fun product you play with. Probably better for a fun facial idea for a younger girls party, but not for an adult skin care regiment.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Soleil

customer_reviews.title: BAD SMELL
customer_reviews.text: This product smells horrible. I couldn’t even keep it on for the full 20 minutes. Not sure what caused the horrible smell!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work at all. My skin didn’t even become less dry.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to get hard on my face and peal off. It stayed wet. I have not noticed any change at all. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: beverly koger

customer_reviews.title: Really Super Nice! ♥
customer_reviews.text: I have a fascination for the products with the gold in them....and this facial mask works nicely to make your skin feel so very soft, removes puffiness and I do feel good about using this product. ♥‿♥
customer_reviews.author: Billio

customer_reviews.title: Love this facial mask! Radiant!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face mask. I feel like I could use the word "radiant" to apply to my skin after using this product. Highly recommend if you are looking for a nice facial mask. Moisturizing properties really do work, and left me feeling revitalized. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I witnessed slightly increased moisture levels after using this product, especially near the orbital bone. This product, while easy to apply, is difficult to remove and leaves a residue. This residue may be beneficial, yet I fear it may be pore-clogging. The packaging is nice and when finished, I might save the jar to reuse for powder clay masks.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for instant results
customer_reviews.text: I’m halfway through my jar, and so far, I love it. The smell isn’t too strong at all and is very pleasant. My skin is overall smoother, and I’m noticing my pores become smaller. It’s also treating blemishes. It’s also very soothing to sensitive skin. I’m so glad I came across this product. I will be reordering soon so that I don’t run out.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: As a 60 year old woman I want to look the best in my age. I use this mask to minimize the appearance of wrinkles on my face and it really does work! The wrinkles in my face are not clearly seen and it gives my skin a elastic feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Lemieux

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product with clean feeling after using
customer_reviews.text: I like this product better than any of the other masks. At first I thought...gold. Really? This product does a great job in moisturizing and is easy to put in and clean off.
customer_reviews.author: SueL

customer_reviews.title: Fades Fine Lines
customer_reviews.text: I have started seeing some signs of aging on my skin, like small lines around my eyes and mouth. I tried this and it helped smooth over the lines after just one time using it !
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t ever dry! Like it always sits on top of my skin with a wet feeling. Overall I see no improvement and it honestly could explain my recent breakouts. It is a great size, but I’m so disappointed with the lack of results.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Johnson

customer_reviews.title: can't see enough of a difference
customer_reviews.text: The texture appears to be soft and easy to apply. Although cant see difference on my face. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For All Skin Types
customer_reviews.text: I am very careful with skin products since I am mostly allergic to them and that's why I had a bad case of acne problem. My mother made me try this mask and it did not sting my face, it gave a cooling effect on my skin. As a result my acne problem disappear and I will continue using this product to control my pimple break outs.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Marlette

customer_reviews.title: Magical face mask truly does what it says !
customer_reviews.text: This mask is really amazing it really works for wrinkles and plumped my face leaving a super moisturized I got complements literally right after I used it will definitely buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not typical mask as it doesn’t dry hard, kind of slimy and takes so work to get off. I’ve had better but will use it until it’s gone...
customer_reviews.author: PDX Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what it’s helping
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure I see any kind of difference. My face feels softer right after I wash it off so that’s a plus. I’ll try it a few more times and see.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Imagine covering your face in real gold!
customer_reviews.text: It spreads evenly and feels fine on the skin. The scent could use some improvement but the results were that my skin felt softer and smoother. I recommend this if you're in need of some pampering.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth skin after using this!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask comes in a neat little container. The mask itself goes on very smooth. After washing your face, it feels so aoft and smooth. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Desire'

customer_reviews.title: Nourishing
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for dull skin , you see the result right after you take off the mask ! The only thing I did not like was the mask does not get dry even if you leave it for 20 minutes , you just wipe it up . I would have loved it more if it gets dry and you peel it off a lot easier , however the result are fascinating and I highly recommend it to anyone !!
customer_reviews.author: Hanaa A.

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it twice, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to really speak on the long term effectiveness of this product. However, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL D. CLARK

customer_reviews.title: Pure and gentle on skin
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed as to how good this product is. I don't like to put lot is chemicals on my face. But this feels pure and gentle on my skin and it makes my skin radiant. Wot can I say I am a fan. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Desai

customer_reviews.title: Bad skin texture
customer_reviews.text: honestly after 25 min I cleared my face and my skin texture was like rubber. Is it ok for this face mask?
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long-term skin smoothing effects
customer_reviews.text: This gold mask definitely works great as a longer term solution for wrinkles, fine lines and other signs of aging on the skin. I have been using it for a few weeks now and I can really see my skin looking smoother and softer
customer_reviews.author: Caidence Young

customer_reviews.title: No irritation and does not get dry
customer_reviews.text: This does not seem to do much for my skin, I consider it a feel good mask because of the color and texture
customer_reviews.author: ET Maria

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Used once so far and didn't have any reaction or irritation. Smelled nice, washed off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Reduces appearance of wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid 60's and I have been using this product 2 times aday and it made my skin smooth, it help lessen the wrinkles and it gives you a feeling of a spa facial treatment! I recommend this product to anyone looking to pamper their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing and I love it. I saw the effect of it right away and I ordered now more for my friends and I'm telling all my friends and family about it and everyone asks me how my face is glowing now it’s because of this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Bingo!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time and I'm impressed! There was a tingly burny feeling the first minute, but I get that with any face treatment, even from my professional facials. The smell doesn't bother me like others stated. Will continue using and will update in the next few months!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Martin

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other mask with better smell like this .i like it but this mask is very sticky and doesn’t absorb my skin the product
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: It's just okay. I haven't noticed any changes to my skin, but I do enjoy the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Joy Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price with Lasting Effect
customer_reviews.text: I've tried using some expensive face mask but none of them worked well and suited my skin type. Luckily, my colleague told me about this product and I totally like the feeling of my skin being deeply moisturized. I also noticed that my wrinkles are less visible now.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: I apply this mask every night as one of my skin care routine. And it truly does help a lot in unclogging dirt in my pores! Also helps new skin rise to the surface for a pink glow.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Melendez

customer_reviews.title: I FEEL LIKE 'GOLDFINGER'S GIRLFRIEND
customer_reviews.text: SINCE I BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT, I'LL USE IT UP BUT WILL NOT PURCHASE IT AGAIN. IT DID NOT ENHANCE MY SKIN'S MOISTURE CONTENT, NOR DID IT 'TIGHTEN'.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA LILLY

customer_reviews.title: Wow - this is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Easy application that provides and cool soothing moisture. I recommend this to anyone looking to pamper themselves while leaving their skin soft and dewy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Great mask my face glows feels great I'll continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M Denny

customer_reviews.title: Pampers Skin
customer_reviews.text: This face mask has given my skin the pampering it deserves. It gives my skin the vitamin and minerals that it needs. It doesn't sting when it is applied and that is a good thing. I love how the result gives me a pinkish fair glow.
customer_reviews.author: Waverly Butler

customer_reviews.title: to work
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not very exciting but it is moisturizing and good value
customer_reviews.author: Florentina G. Dinu

customer_reviews.title: Too oily
customer_reviews.text: I like it I have to limit my usage because it's too oily on my face
customer_reviews.author: Jessy73

customer_reviews.title: IMPROVEMENT
customer_reviews.text: I am 68 and it works very well for my skin if it continues to improve my skin i will buy again....i've only been using it for 10 days
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wth is this?
customer_reviews.text: Stinks and burns my face. I really believe this product was made without much thought in someone’s kitchen . Wth is this? Brought it months ago and it’s still in my dresser , just taking up space. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Karamel Love

customer_reviews.title: Colot is more beige than pink
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it feels, soft and subtle. Size is bigger than expected!!
customer_reviews.author: pricefam08

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product I've used it like four times. And my skin looks clearer healthier, and it has a glow. I saw a change just after only one use no lie. Im totally going to order it again for sure. My mom and sister love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hate it
customer_reviews.text: feel nothing from this mask. i only like masks that make me feel a difference of some kind.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is very moisturizing. My skin feels so soft after i rinse it off.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Love this gold mask. It’s cooling and leaves skin feeling fresh evens out skin tones
customer_reviews.author: RainNJ

customer_reviews.title: Hydrates and Nourish Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and dull face after a long days of working outside. When Iam doing my skin care routine this is always the alst step. It helps my face be nourished again and also it provides my skin some hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Nella Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Pure Gold Facial
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a Christmas gift and received a very happy thank you call for it. Success!
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome. I have dry skin and it moisturizing and light. It's easy to apply and take off. I've used it twice so far and I see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Elettra Nicoletta

customer_reviews.title: SO groopy
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible, extremely sticky. Not worth the money. never again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 6-8 times before writing a review. This smells awful! It’s consistently smelled terrible! It doesn’t get any better as you’re using it. Bummer! It moisturizes ok, nothing special. The jar is cute. I would not really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gold Facial Mask Review
customer_reviews.text: Great facial mask. My skin feels like silk after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: I want to rub this all over my body! It leaves my skin feeling so soft! and my pores are minimized after. Def going to buy again!
customer_reviews.author: CCxSuga

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time of using this product. It tightens the facial pores, gives younger look & you will definitely notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I order this repeatedly and the ingredients work great on my skin. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Prasanna K Prabhakaran

customer_reviews.title: Glowing Skin
customer_reviews.text: It us a nice mask that leaves your skin glowing after using it. When applying the mask you can feel it cooling making it feel that it is removing the dirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Harlowe Williams

customer_reviews.title: Brightens my Skin
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this product for my skincare. Ever since using this mask, I noticed that my impurities have disappeared. Now my skin is much brighter and glowing than before.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Akin

customer_reviews.title: Works for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: A fun and gentle face mask treatment for all skin types. I used it with my sisters for our home spa day - everyone loved it and didn't see any skin irritations after using it
customer_reviews.author: Misty Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Effectively brightens skin
customer_reviews.text: This facial mask was delivered to me last week. I have only used it once yet the results are truly promising. It left my skin soft, deeply moisturized, and bright. I'm highly recommending this!
customer_reviews.author: Aurore Renault

product_meta.title: Majestic Pure Gold Facial Mask, Help Reduces the Appearances of Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Ancient Gold Face Mask Formula - 8.8 Oz
feature_bullets: Majestic Pure 24K Gold Facial Mask is an excellent formula based on powerful ingredients that help in reducing the appearance of wrinkles. Brighten the appearance of skin; MADE in USA
Luxurious facial gold mask with powerful beneficial ingredients such as real 24K gold and Vitamin E

SAFETY WARNING: For external use only. Rub a very small amount on the inside of your elbow area to test for any allergic reaction before use. Avoid contact with eyes, keep out of the reach of children. If pregnant, consult with your health care provider before use.
Majestic Pure 24K Gold Face Mask is cruelty free and not tested on animals
